attributes.action: To generate Mr Mercer MP for Plymouth back to Veterans Minster.
attributes.additional_details: Renstaye Mr Mercer as he is the one trusted by Veterans.
attributes.background: We need to have some solid and works with Veterans. Not just a tick box exercise.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked, replaced or given a new role.
